vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: yiz.re.e.li (יִזְרְעֵאלִי "Jezreel" H3158)
§ Jezreel = "God sows"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a descendant of the father or founder of Etam of Judah
2) first son of Hosea the prophet
n pr loc
3) a city in the Nekeb of Judah
4) a city in Issachar on the northwest spur of Mount Gilboa
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ciudad; territorio de Judá; (b)   ciudad y valle; territorio de Isacar; (c)   hombre; tribu de Judá; (d)   hijo de Oseas
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶斯列 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 「神栽種」
陽性專有名詞
1) 猶大地以坦創建人的後裔 ( 代上 4:6)
2) 先知何西阿的長子 ( 何 1:4)
專有名詞 地名
3) 猶大地尼吉境內的城邑 ( 書 15:56)
4) 以薩迦支派的城邑, 位於基利波山的西北向支脈
( 撒上 28:4; 31:8; 撒下 1:6,21; 21:12; 代上 10:1,8)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶斯列 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 「神栽种」
阳性专有名词
1) 犹大地以坦创建人的后裔 ( 代上 4:6)
2) 先知何西阿的长子 ( 何 1:4)
专有名词 地名
3) 犹大地尼吉境内的城邑 ( 书 15:56)
4) 以萨迦支派的城邑, 位于基利波山的西北向支脉
( 撒上 28:4; 31:8; 撒下 1:6,21; 21:12; 代上 10:1,8)

§ Jezreel = "God sows"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a descendant of the father or founder of Etam of Judah
2) first son of Hosea the prophet
n pr loc
3) a city in the Nekeb of Judah
4) a city in Issachar on the northwest spur of Mount Gilboa

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.3;
son of: Hur (H2354);
brother of: Uri (H0221), Shobal (H7732H), Salma (H8007H), Hareph (H2780), Ishma (H3457), Idbash (H3031), Hazzelelponi (H6753), Penuel (H6439H) and Ezer (H5829)
§ Jezreel = "God sows"
n pr m
1) a descendant of the father or founder of Etam of Judah
2) first son of Hosea the prophet
n pr loc
3) a city in the Nekeb of Judah
4) a city in Issachar on the northwest spur of Mount Gilboa

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Hos.1.4;
son of: Hosea (H1954J) and Gomer (H1586H);
brother of: Lo-ruhamah (H3819) , Lo-ammi lo am.mi (לֹא עַמִּי "Not My People" H3818))
